title: Apex Legends Tier List
description: Discover the top-ranked Legends in Apex Legends as of February 2025. Our comprehensive tier list breaks down each Legend's strengths and weaknesses to help you choose the best character for your playstyle.
heading: Apex Legends Tier List
introText: Discover the top-ranked Legends in Apex Legends as of February 2025. Our comprehensive tier list breaks down each Legend's strengths and weaknesses to help you choose the best character for your playstyle.

data.itemDescription: A new Skirmisher Legend introduced in Season 23, Alter offers unparalleled mobility and versatility, allowing teams to engage and disengage from fights with ease. Her abilities make her a formidable choice for both solo and team play
An exceptional tracker, Bloodhound provides invaluable reconnaissance by revealing enemy positions, making them indispensable for teams seeking aggressive engagements
With superior vertical mobility, Horizon can access high ground effortlessly and control engagements using her gravity-manipulating abilities, making her a dominant force in battles
Known for her ability to reposition and avoid damage, Wraith remains a top pick. Her dimensional tactics allow for strategic retreats and surprise attacks, keeping enemies on their toes
Serving as the team's shield, Gibraltar offers robust defensive capabilities. His protective dome and defensive bombardment can turn the tide of battles, providing both cover and area denial
A master of movement, Pathfinder's grappling hook and zipline gun grant exceptional traversal options, enabling teams to navigate the battlefield swiftly and secure advantageous positions
Combining reconnaissance with offensive prowess, Ash can locate recent deathboxes to track enemies and utilize her snare and phase breach abilities to control engagements effectively
Offering team-wide repositioning with her Skyward Dive, Valkyrie excels in mobility and scouting. Her jetpacks provide vertical movement, allowing for quick escapes or advantageous positioning
A defensive powerhouse, Caustic's gas traps and grenades can control areas and dissuade enemy advances, making him invaluable for holding strategic positions
With abilities that suppress enemies and a totem that grants a second chance in fights, Revenant is a formidable assassin capable of disrupting opponents' strategies
As a support Legend, Lifeline provides crucial healing and revives. Her drone offers consistent healing, and her care package can supply essential gear upgrades
Prioritizing speed, Octane's stim allows for rapid movement, and his jump pad facilitates quick team rotations or aggressive pushes, catering to high-octane playstyles
Specializing in area control, Catalyst can fortify doors and deploy a permeable wall to obscure vision, providing strategic advantages in both offense and defense
A versatile combatant, Bangalore's smoke can obscure vision, and her rolling thunder ultimate can disrupt enemy formations, making her adaptable to various combat scenarios
An expert in fortifications, Wattson can set up electric fences and intercept incoming ordnance, making her ideal for defensive strategies and area denial
A newer Legend, Conduit offers shield regeneration and support capabilities, enhancing team durability during prolonged engagements
Focusing on team protection, Newcastle can deploy movable shields and revive teammates while providing cover, bolstering team survivability
A demolitionist, Fuse excels in using explosives to damage and displace enemies, controlling the battlefield with his arsenal of grenades and cluster bombs
Providing real-time tracking, Seer's abilities can reveal and interrupt enemies, offering tactical advantages in locating and countering opponents
A sniper specialist, Vantage can mark enemies for increased damage and reposition using her companion Echo, making her lethal at long ranges
With the ability to deploy cover and a mounted machine gun, Rampart can establish strong defensive positions, though her setup time can be a vulnerability
An aggressive pusher, Mad Maggie's abilities allow her to breach defenses and maintain momentum in fights, favoring close-quarters combat
Utilizing a surveillance drone, Crypto can gather intelligence and disable enemy traps, but his reliance on the drone can leave him vulnerable
Equipped with an array of weapon-enhancing abilities, Ballistic can boost his team's firepower, though his impact is contingent on effective weapon usage
A master thief, Loba can teleport to hard-to-reach places and provide her team with valuable loot, enhancing their equipment loadout

His ultimate is great for deceiving enemies, and his passive with hidden resurrection is his main strength. In skilled hands, Mirage can annoy opponents and pull off unexpected clutch plays, but he requires a lot of skill and effort to be effective
